data: On the 15th of May, 1796, General Bonaparte marched into the city of Milan, at the head of the youthful army which had just crossed the Bridge of Lodi, and taught the world that, after the lapse of centuries, Cæsar and Alexander had found a successor at last.
15th of May, 1796 | Milan | Bridge of Lodi

The Chartreuse of Parma
Translated from the French of Stendhal
